constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The Plans submitted with the application are unclear, the 2 proposed ground floor plans are different in more ways than described on the application form. A fresh application should be submitted clearly identifying the proposed changes on the plans (the changes should be clouded)The application forms seeks permission to add a SVP and Boiler Flue - but no details are provided to show these changes on the elevation plans.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00314/HOU (Erection of single storey rear and side extension. Hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion) dated 13/04/2021.  Amendments to consist of rendering the rear blockwork rather than clad with timber2. The side wall adjacent No 40 has been set 120mm away from the neighbour's wall in order to respect the neighbour's request that the new wall was not constructed immediately adjacent to his wall.3. A boiler flue and SVPs have been added to the side elevation facing No 40 for completeness.
